1.name: Cat
1.dialogue: Hi! Welcome to World Of Software!

3.name: Cat
3.dialogue: Hmm..Don't worry, I can show you around!

4.name: Dog
4.dialogue: In World Of Software there are 4 main regions, some of which are locked on your map right now

5.name: Cat
5.dialogue: You can unlock them by progressing through each region and answering different questions related to the SDLC lifecycle

6.name: Cat
6.dialogue: Go ahead and click on the first region that is lighted up on your map
